name: Chicago (Bombjack Ltd.)
overview: Not to be confused with the game from CP Verlag of the same name, Chicago is a crosshair shooter developed by Bombjack Ltd. using the Shoot 'em Up Construction Kit. It was released to the public domain in 1988. The game takes place during the Al Capone era of Chicago. Shoot and kill the mobsters in the building before they shoot and kill you.
